product_description: A sky-high espadrille-style wedge and platform call attention to a breezy sandal featuring basket-woven straps that crisscross at the toe.
product_details_and_care:
A sky-high espadrille-style wedge and platform call attention to a breezy sandal featuring basket-woven straps that crisscross at the toe.
4" heel; 1 3/4" platform
Adjustable ankle strap with buckle closure
Leather upper/synthetic lining and sole
Imported
Women's Shoes
Item #6003556
